titles: The message of John Lambert Esq, in answer to the proclamation
author: Lambert, John, 1619-1683, attributed name.
notes: A satire, signed "John Lambert.", in response to a proclamation of Parliament, dated 13 Feb. 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
